700013f-a.text:
Third Ave., at the N.E. corner of Brook Ave. (extreme left), showing the old Bronx Borough (County) Court House. A new county court house was erected on Grand Concourse and East 161st Street
which was officially opened in 1934.
SGE NE  1914.
Brown Brothers.
. Intersection of Brook Ave. E 3rd Ave. Court House.
Neg. A-52  April 30, 1941
P.L. Sperr, photographer
